com.stoyanr.evictor

Interface EvictionQueue<K,V>

  • Type Parameters:
    K - the type of keys maintained by the map
    V - the type of mapped values
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    NavigableMapEvictionQueue, PriorityEvictionQueue

    public interface EvictionQueue<K,V>
    A priority queue of evictible entries used by AbstractQueueEvictionScheduler to store entries that should be evicted automatically in the order in which they should be evicted. It provides methods for adding and removing entries, as well as evicting expired entries.
    Author:
    Stoyan Rachev

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean evictEntries()
      Evicts all entries that have expired from their maps and removes them from the queue.
      long getNextEvictionTime()
      Returns the next eviction time of all entries contained in the queue, or 0 if the queue is empty.
      boolean hasEntries()
      Returns true if this queue contains any entries.
      void putEntry(EvictibleEntry<K,V> e)
      Puts the specified evictible entry into the queue.
      void removeEntry(EvictibleEntry<K,V> e)
      Removes the specified evictible entry from the queue.

    • Method Detail

      • hasEntries

        boolean hasEntries()
        Returns true if this queue contains any entries.
        Returns:
        true if this queue contains any entries

      • getNextEvictionTime

        long getNextEvictionTime()
        Returns the next eviction time of all entries contained in the queue, or 0 if the queue is empty. Since the queue is sorted by the entries eviction time, this is the eviction time of the first entry (head).
        Returns:
        the next eviction time of all entries contained in the queue, or 0 if the queue is empty

      • putEntry

        void putEntry(EvictibleEntry<K,V> e)
        Puts the specified evictible entry into the queue.
        Parameters:
        e - the entry to be put into the queue.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the entry is null

      • removeEntry

        void removeEntry(EvictibleEntry<K,V> e)
        Removes the specified evictible entry from the queue.
        Parameters:
        e - the entry to be removed from the queue.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the entry is null

      • evictEntries

        boolean evictEntries()
        Evicts all entries that have expired from their maps and removes them from the queue.
        Returns:
        true if any entries have been evicted
